string.name: intro0
string.orig: With Call Meter 3G you can monitor the usage of your calls, messages and data connections.

resources.string: Sa Call Meterom 3G možete nadgledati potrošnju vaših poziva, poruka i prijenos podataka

string.name: intro1
string.orig: In order to get accurate statistics, it is important to accurately set Call Meter 3G as they will be billed.

resources.string: Da bi te dobili točne statističke podatke, važno je točno postaviti Call Meter 3G način računanja

string.name: intro_import
string.orig: If your billing is more complex, for example because messages and calls are billed as merged units, you can import pre-configured rules. Just select the menu Import rule set.

resources.string: Ako je vaše računanje kompleksnije, npr. ako se poruke i pozivi računaju zajedno, možete uvesti već konfigurirana pravila. Samo odaberite u Izborniku Uvezi pravila

string.name: intro_export
string.orig: In any case, when everything is set up, you can export your rules to me. Thus, all other users can benefit from your work.

resources.string: U svakom slučaju, kad je sve postavljeno, možete izvesti pravila meni. Tako da i ostali mogu koristiti povlastice vašeg rada.

string.name: intro_recalc0
string.orig: The statistics are recalculated after each change to the configuration. This will take some time depending on the number of calls or messages and used phone. It therefore makes sense to adjust all the settings possible in one fell swoop.

resources.string: Statistika se preračunava nakon svake promjene konfiguracije. Za to je potrebno neko vrijeme ovisno o broju poziva ili poruka i korištenju telefona. Najbolje je podesiti sve postavke odjednom.

string.name: intro_recalc1
string.orig: The process can be greatly accelerated by the setting Beginning of recording or Delete logs older than.

resources.string: Proces može biti veoma ubrzan od strane postavki Početak snimanja ili Obriši izvješća starija od.

string.name: intro_data
string.orig: Please note that no data statistics from before the last phone boot can be displayed.

resources.string: Molimo imajte u vidu da statistički podaci prije zadnjeg pokretanja telefona mogu biti prikazani.

string.name: intro_kill
string.orig: Please note that killing the app can lead to corrupted (data) statistics.

resources.string: Molim Vas imajte na umu prekid aplikacije može voditi do korumpiranosti (podaci) statistike.

string.name: intro_simple
string.orig: Most users need only set their settings in menu Basic settings. Just set the number of inclusive minutes or messages, as well as adjust the cost of calls made, etc..

resources.string: Većina korisnika treba samo postaviti postavke u Osnovna podešenja. samo postavite broj besplatnih minuta ili poruka, kao i podešavanja cijenu poziva, itd...
